content:
Manage Promoted Search Terms in Knowledge Articles

From a single page, you can view, edit, and delete all the promoted search terms that are associated with Salesforce Knowledge articles.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience

Salesforce Knowledge is available in Unlimited Edition with Service Cloud. For other editions, it's available for an additional cost.

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
Manage Promoted Search Terms

To add terms to articles, influence search results, view assigned terms, edit a term, or delete a term, follow these steps:

From Setup, enter Promoted Search Terms in the Quick Find box.
Select Promoted Search Terms.
Sort by Article Title column to see assigned terms.
Click Edit in a row to edit a term.
Click Delete in a row to delete a term. Note: The term is deleted only from the associated article.

Improve the Knowledge Article Search Experience
Salesforce Knowledge Help and Resources
title: Manage Promoted Search Terms in Salesforce Knowledge
